content.title: Financial Assistance to Workers with a Visually, Physically or Mentally Disabled Child- Haryana Labour Welfare Board
content.beneficiary: Workers with a Visually, Physically or Mentally Disabled Child
content.details: This scheme provides financial assistance to workers who have a child with visual, physical, or mental disabilities.
eligibility: Applicant must be a registered worker under the Haryana Labour Welfare Board
The child must have a certified disability
content.application_process: Online application through the Haryana Labour Welfare Board website and Antyodaya-SARAL Portal.
documents_required: Proof of registration as a worker
